kjv_def: + years old, season, space, (X often-)time(-s), (a) while
strongs_def: a space of time (in general, and thus properly distinguished from G2540 (χρόνος), which designates a fixed or special occasion; and from G165 (χρόνος), which denotes a particular period) or interval; by extension, an individual opportunity; by implication, delay
